books.title: Gone girl
books.description: Gone Girl is a 2012 crime thriller novel by American writer Gillian Flynn. It was published by Crown Publishing Group in June 2012. The novel became popular and made the New York Times Best Seller list. The sense of suspense in the novel comes from whether or not Nick Dunne is involved in the disappearance of his wife Amy.
books.author: Gillian Flynn

books.title: The Silent Patient

books.author: Alex Michaelides
